name: sequelize-mocking
description: A Sequelize extension to deal with mocking for tests

scripts.build-es5: npm run delete lib-es5 && node ./node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js lib --presets es2015 --out-dir lib-es5
scripts.checkstyle: npm run delete ./target/eslint-reporter-checkstyle.xml && node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js --config=.eslintrc --output-file ./target/eslint-reporter-checkstyle.xml --format checkstyle ./lib
scripts.prenpmversion: npm run build-es5 && git add -A lib-es5
scripts.bump-major: npm test && npm run npmversion -- --increment major --git-push
scripts.bump-minor: npm test && npm run npmversion -- --increment minor --git-push
scripts.bump-patch: npm test && npm run npmversion -- --increment patch --git-push

author: Julien Roche
